title: Shin Splints Treatment Guidelines
content: Shin splints (medial tibial stress syndrome) present as exercise-induced pain along the posteromedial tibial border. Treatment includes relative rest, ice application, and gentle stretching of posterior compartment muscles. Biomechanical assessment may identify contributing factors such as overpronation requiring orthotic intervention. Gradual return to activity follows pain resolution, with emphasis on proper footwear and training technique modification.
